title: FAT LEONARD - #7: Suppos
description: A cocksure Navy officer called David Schaus takes on Leonard. He’s joined by a principled Navy supply official called Teresa Kelly. Finally, they force Navy admirals, who for years have given him cover, to take Leonard’s fraud seriously.
itunes:title: FAT LEONARD: Suppos
itunes:subtitle: A Navy whistleblower moves to confront Leonard, but top admirals lend him cover.
author: podcastsprojectbrazen@gmail.com (Project Brazen Originals)
